h2_title: Cloudy Mist, Misty Cloud Boss Fight and Guide
img_above_text:
# Cloudy Mist, Misty Cloud

Cloudy Mist, Misty Cloud are a pair of Yaoguai Chiefs you'll fight before you reach The Emerald Hall in Chapter 5 in Black Myth: Wukong. This is the second duo of chiefs you'll fight in Chapter 5 and they'll try a number of tricks to disappear right before your eyes.


As soon as you pass through the archway, the next boss battle will begin and you'll discover who was responsible for the voices you heard earlier.

## Cloudy Mist, Misty Cloud Boss Fight and Guide

Misty Cloud will soon appear, though he will look almost see-through initially. He will often pop up as soon as Cloudy Mist has finished a set of moves, hoping to catch you off guard and hit you with his flaming bundle.

The key to keeping track of this creature is to see where the cloud moves and jump out of the way when it gets close to you. Misty Cloud favors the use of a flaming bundle, operating it like a hammer and delivering fire attacks.
img_below_text: As Cloudy Mist is the first to appear, this should be where you first attack. Things will change when you manage to hit Cloudy Mist enough times that it will send out a bright light as a flashbang that can stun both you and Misty Cloud. For a brief moment, Misty Cloud won't be able to see you and Cloudy Mist will become its eyes.

Preceding Text Summary:  
The preceding text introduces the boss fight against Cloudy Mist and Misty Cloud, a duo of Yaoguai Chiefs encountered in Chapter 5 of *Black Myth: Wukong*. Misty Cloud uses a flaming bundle for fire-based attacks and attempts to catch players off guard, while Cloudy Mist is the first to appear, initiating the battle.

Image Summary:  
The image depicts the start of the boss fight against Cloudy Mist and Misty Cloud. The scene is dark and atmospheric, with a menacing figure (likely Cloudy Mist) holding a staff and emerging from the shadows. The environment features a glowing structure in the background, adding to the ominous tone. The text overlay at the bottom reads, "Halt! Intruders... to the Princess' palace face death," signaling the start of the confrontation. Health bars for both Cloudy Mist and Misty Cloud are visible, indicating a dual boss fight.

Following Text Summary:  
The following text explains the strategy for the fight, emphasizing that players should focus on attacking Cloudy Mist first. After sustaining enough damage, Cloudy Mist will emit a flashbang-like bright light that stuns both the player and Misty Cloud. During this moment, Misty Cloud becomes temporarily disoriented, relying on Cloudy Mist for guidance.
